Package islandtrader.core

Class Pirate

java.lang.Object
islandtrader.core.Entity
islandtrader.core.RandomEvent
islandtrader.core.Pirate
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Pirate
extends RandomEvent
Represents a Pirate to be used in the RandomEvents encounters that will happen when Trader is sailing.
Author:
Maria Heloisa Balzaretti

  • Constructor Details

    • Pirate

      public Pirate​(int idNumber, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, int numberNeededToScapeThisPirate, int happinessLevel)
      A new Pirate Object is instantiated
      Parameters:
      idNumber - this Pirate id number
      name - this Pirate name
      description - this Pirate description
      numberNeededToScapeThisPirate - the number to try to escape from this Pirate
      happinessLevel - this Pirate happiness level

  • Method Details

    • randomEventSpecificAction

      public void randomEventSpecificAction​(Trader trader)
      Generates the specific action when Trader encounters Pirate RandomEvent It calls the helper methods to the Trader play the dice and the consequences of each outcome. if Trader can escape, Trader keep all goods. if Trader cannot escape and pirate has to be happy to only take the goods or make the Trader walk the plank and ends the game.
      Specified by:
      randomEventSpecificAction in class RandomEvent
      Parameters:
      trader - will endure the actions from the random events

      encounterMessage in class RandomEvent
      Returns:
      string to be set in each specific event

    • getMessagePirateTakeAllGoods

      public java.lang.String getMessagePirateTakeAllGoods()

      Returns:

    • getMessagePirateHappy

      public java.lang.String getMessagePirateHappy()
      The message used when the Pirate is happy with the goods
      Returns:
      MESSAGE_HAPPY_PIRATE and the value of the dice played.

    • getMessageWalkPlank

      public java.lang.String getMessageWalkPlank()
      The message used when the pirate is not happy with the goods
      Returns:
      MESSAGE_WALK_THE_PLANK and the value of the dice played.

    • getMessageScapedFromPirate
